I fixed the fullscreen thing for my PC.

I'm running Windows 7 Ultimate 32 bit.

1) Enter the launcher properties and set the compatibility to Windows XP (Service Pack 3).
2) Enter the WormsMayhem.exe properties and also set the compatibility to Windows XP (Service Pack 3).
3) Run the launcher as administrator and set the resolution to your monitor's resolution and make sure fullscreen is on.
4) Start the game and enjoy it in fullscreen!
